text: i LOVE this game!!!! Man i did every single drawing in the damn game, free hand!!! it was perfect timing because i was JUST learning how to draw, along with my animation classes. Disney Art Academy was also good, but it didnt hype me as much as the Pokemon one. I also like the WiiU one, there was a time i was playing the Pokemon AA game and the WiiU one in the same time frame LOL!!! Fantastic series
